channel.title: Yang Yang - Homepage
channel.description: Yang Yang's Homepage, Computer Technology MS student at South-Central Minzu University, focusing on Multimodal Medical Image Analysis and Computer Vision

item.title: HSFPN-Det: An Effective Model for Detecting Rice Pests and Diseases
item.description: A novel deep learning model for rice pest and disease detection, currently under review at The Visual Computer journal.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: An Improved YOLOv8-Based Rice Pest and Disease Detection Method
item.description: We propose an improved YOLOv8-based method for accurate detection of rice pests and diseases. Published in Computer Graphics International Conference (CGI) 2024.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: SimpleTex-OCR TypeScript Version
item.description: A modern LaTeX formula recognition desktop application based on Electron+React+TypeScript. It supports screenshot recognition, file upload, multi-format copy and export.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: Rice Pest and Disease Detection System
item.description: A comprehensive system for rice pest and disease detection based on the CGI2024 paper. Includes code, demo, and dataset.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: CGI2024 Conference Talk
item.description: Presentation of "An Improved YOLOv8-Based Rice Pest and Disease Detection Method" at Computer Graphics International Conference 2024.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)
